summary: Fly.io migration testing completed successfully. All backend endpoints are working correctly, CORS is properly configured, database connectivity is healthy, and configuration files are valid for Fly.io deployment. No hardcoded Render URLs found.
passed_tests: Backend /health endpoint returns healthy status with database connected
Backend /api/crypto endpoint returns cryptocurrency data (20 cryptocurrencies)
Backend CORS headers correctly configured for production origins
Backend health check includes database status (connected)
No hardcoded Render URLs found in critical config files
Frontend environment variables correctly set for Fly.io (cryptovault-api.fly.dev)
Vercel.json rewrites properly configured for Fly.io backend
fly.toml configuration file is valid with all required sections
Dockerfile.fly is valid with all required elements
